section.title: Cealkkačoakkáldagaid dásit
section.p: There are four sentence collections, each with its own word class alternatives.
The verb declension is adjusted to defferent learner levels, as such:

ol.li: introductory level: imperative (only 2sg) ja indicative (only present)
medium level: imperative (only 2. pers), indicative (both present and past) and actio.
high level: indicative, imperative and conditional, in all persons and numbers. Also passive and some infinite forms, such as verb abessive.
In the fourth set you may inflect the verbs in potential, and you may work with adjectives, numerals, reflexive pronouns and possessive suffixes.

section.p: In the 1-3. sentence collections you may also inflect nouns and pronouns.

section.title: Making student groups
section.p: The teacher should register herself/himself as a teacher, and the pupils should register the user name of their teacher when they register themselves. Then the teacher may follow the work of the pupils.

section.title: Side forms
section.p: In the present 3pl we accept dohkkehuvvojit both boradit and boradat.
In the past 3sg we accept both lei and leai.
In the potential 3cg we accept both leažžá and leaš and bođeža and bođeš, and for 1pl boražit and boražat.
For adjective comp sg the accepted forms are divraseabbo and divrasat.
